span.style: border: 1px solid rgb(129, 129, 81); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 225); font-size: x-small; white-space: nowrap; padding:0px 2px;

dl.dd: If set to true, the best match will be filled into the textbox as the user types. If false, the default, the value will not be filled in until the user selects an item.
